mapper.insert: insert into tbl_game_reviews(rno, content, userid, gno, regDate) values(seq_review.nextval, #{content}, #{userid}, #{gno}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update tbl_game_reviews set content= #{content}, regDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from tbl_game_reviews where gno = #{gno}
select rownum rn, rno, gno , content, r.userid, likes, regDate, updateDate, m.name from tbl_game_reviews r left outer join tbl_member m on r.userid = m.userid where gno = #{gno}
